welcome_message_body: Welcome to Altamira, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city known for its rich culture, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Altamira has to offer.

restaurants.name: Altamira Restaurante Y Bar
restaurants.description: Altamira Restaurante Y Bar is a latin american restaurant located in Altamira.
restaurants.address: En el parquecito de la piedra, 57000 Altamira
